ml.alternet.parser.ast

Class NodeBuilder<Node>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.parser.handlers.TreeHandler<Node,Node>
      • ml.alternet.parser.ast.NodeBuilder<Node>
  • Type Parameters:
    Node - The type of the target node.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<Node>, Rewindable, Builder<Node>, Mappers<Node>, EventsHandler, Handler, DataHandler<Node>, ValueMapper<Node>, ValueStack.Stackable<ValueMapper.Value<Node>>

    public class NodeBuilder<Node>
extends TreeHandler<Node,Node>
implements Builder<Node>, Mappers<Node>
    Build an homogeneous AST from a grammar, tokens mapper, and rules mapper.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeBuilder

        public NodeBuilder(Grammar grammar)
        Create a node builder. By default, the tokens mapper extract the value of the tokens and the rules mapper does nothing.
        Parameters:
        grammar - The grammar used during parsing.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public Optional<Node> parse(Scanner input,
                            boolean matchAll)
                     throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Builder
        Entry point for building an expression.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface Builder<Node>
        Parameters:
        input - An expression that follows the grammar, e.g. "sin(x)*(1+var_12)"
        matchAll - true to indicates that if the input contains more characters at the end of the parsing, an error will be reported, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A value of the type expected.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an I/O error occurs.
